title: World Of The Supernatural
description:
Jessica Jones is a very curious woman. As a researcher in all things paranormal, she has gone down many roads, seeking answers to questions involving ghosts, extra-terrestrials, big feet and much more. As with anyone seeking answers in these areas, she’s been left with far more questions than answers. Today we discuss her research, experiences, and the beliefs she’s come to hold on her journey through the paranormal.


PART 2 - AVAILABLE TO GRAVE KEEPERS ONLY - LISTEN HERE

 In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

    • Why is it that some plots of land are more prone to being a “hot spot” of paranormal activity than others?
    • What happened when Jessica’s crew came across a portal in the middle of a field?
    • How did Jessica communicate with what she believes to be an “E.T.”?
    • Are we sometimes visited by “E.T.’s” in dreams, in the same way that some are visited by deceased loved ones, making it more of a spiritual experience, than that of a physical one?”.

  • As a Grave Keeper, for $5 per month, you will get:
  • Access to every episode of our show, AD-FREE – MONTHS BEFORE THEY GO PUBLIC.
  • Access to every EXCLUSIVE PART 2 episode of our show for Grave Keeper Only!
  • Access to submit questions to upcoming guests of our show.
  • The “good feeling” knowing that you are keeping this show alive (It really does feel good!)
Listen to part two of this interview and get exclusive access to HUNDREDS of bonus episodes at http://www.patreon.com/thegravetalks
